casebody.data:
Representative Donald TURNER, Jr. and Senator Joseph Benning
v.
Governor Peter SHUMLIN SUPREME COURT DOCKET NO. 16-428 Supreme Court of Vermont. December Term, 2016
January 3, 2017

*1173ENTRY ORDER

¶ 1. Senator Richard Sears' motion to file an amicus curiae brief in support of respondent's position is granted. Amicus curiae's motion for an additional ten minutes to argue beyond the time allotted to respondent is denied.
